div.div: Cosmo is a 15-year-old boy who just received the hacker equivalent of a death sentence. All of his electronics: gone. The Internet: off-limits until he's 21. He's completely vanished from the world he called home.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TxGTHY&via=Digg&text=Banned From The Internet

div.a: Mysterious Code Used By Founding Father Is Finally Cracked

div.div: The obscure book's margins are virtually filled with clusters of curious foreign characters — a mysterious shorthand used by 17th century religious dissident Roger Williams. For centuries the scribbles went undeciphered. But a team of Brown University students has finally cracked the code.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TxYPCc&via=Digg&text=Mysterious Code Used By Founding Father Is Finally Cracked

div.div: THE POWER OF FASHION COMPELS YOU

div.a: Milan Diocese Creates Exorcism Hotline After Demand Doubles

div.div: The Catholic diocese of Milan has doubled the number of priests who practice exorcism and set up a hotline to deal with the volume of calls.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YyezM6&via=Digg&text=Milan Diocese Creates Exorcism Hotline After Demand Doubles

div.a: Bradley Manning Tells A Very Depressing Story About His Underwear

div.div: After Bradley Manning's very serious appearance on the stand during his pretrial hearing yesterday, the man facing charges for the Wikileaks security breach has in his testimony today unleashed this truth of Iraq that America may never unlearn.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X8RwqA&via=Digg&text=Bradley Manning Tells A Very Depressing Story About His Underwear

div.div: Gotye, Rihanna, and Alex Clare were some of Shazam's most-tagged artists this year, the British firm has revealed. It's just published its global list of top-tagged songs and artistes of 2012, as well as predicting who is going to do well in 2013.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SjYKnj&via=Digg&text=Who's The Next Rihanna?

div.a: Is It Time For The US To Ditch The Dollar Bill?

div.div: It seems well past time that the US ditch its $1 bill, considering such a move could save the country somewhere in the neighborhood of $4 billion.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Trw9ev&via=Digg&text=Is It Time For The US To Ditch The Dollar Bill?

div.a: Where Are The World's Deadliest Major Cities?

div.div: New York City was violent-crime free for a day earlier this week, but where does the Big Apple rank in the world's deadliest major cities?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SkzAVx&via=Digg&text=Where Are The World's Deadliest Major Cities?

div.a: Classic Movies Improved By The Addition Of Nicolas Cage

div.div: There’s Cage on the phone with Drew Barrymore in "Scream," and there he is again yelling at pregnant Juno, and covered in bees in "My Girl."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yul0Ql&via=Digg&text=Classic Movies Improved By The Addition Of Nicolas Cage

div.a: Why Are All These People Pouring Milk All Over Themselves?

div.div: Have you heard of the latest thing? It's called milking, and it's when you pour a carton of milk on your head in public.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WyS97X&via=Digg&text=Why Are All These People Pouring Milk All Over Themselves?

div.a: New York City's Neon All But Dimmed

div.div: While neon lighting may be losing out to LED and lighted plastic in the commercial world, the classic neon signs of New York City seem to be glowing particularly bright at this point in time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YyLAb1&via=Digg&text=New York City's Neon All But Dimmed

div.a: How Amazon Followed Google Into The World Of Secret Servers

div.div: “They were clearly not your average Dell, HP, IBM servers. They were white box machines, very densely packed. They weren’t in containers. They were just blades jammed into these custom racks.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TqhC2s&via=Digg&text=How Amazon Followed Google Into The World Of Secret Servers

div.a: No Answers In Death Of Technician Linked To Breitbart

div.div: A right-wing media star drops dead… a coroner’s technician dies weeks later… right-wing blogs erupt! Seven months later, we know the technician died from arsenic poisoning. But who did it? And why?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UwmOoU&via=Digg&text=No Answers In Death Of Technician Linked To Breitbart

div.div: Christian Slater really tried to vote in the election this year, but Florida turned him down.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VaPro4&via=Digg&text=Christian Slater's Vote Didn't Count

div.a: How Two Presidents Helped A Father Understand His Son's Asperger's Syndrome

div.div: Clinton didn’t notice that Tyler, already attention-challenged, had become bored. Suddenly, I saw Tyler in another light. If even Bill Clinton, the most talented people person in a generation, can miss obvious social cues, why worry so much about my son?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SxEU7K&via=Digg&text=How Two Presidents Helped A Father Understand His Son's Asperger's Syndrome

div.a: The First Powerball Winners Have Been Revealed, And They're Impossible To Hate

div.div: So you know the people who dashed your hopes of winning that stupidly large Powerball jackpot, instantly crushing your dreams of living like a king and dipping your butt in gold? Everyone who knows them says the first winners are pretty awesome people.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tr10HY&via=Digg&text=The First Powerball Winners Have Been Revealed, And They're Impossible To Hate

div.div: Hated and mocked in much of the world, the Nazi leader has developed a strange following among schoolchildren and readers of Mein Kampf in India. Here's how political leader Bal Thackeray influenced Indians to admire Hitler and despise Gandhi.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Va1nqh&via=Digg&text=Hitler’s Strange Afterlife In India

div.a: Kurt Vonnegut’s Delightful Term Paper Assignment From 1965

div.div: "I invite you to read the fifteen tales in 'Masters of the Modern Short Story.' Read them for pleasure and satisfaction, beginning each as though, only seven minutes before, you had swallowed two ounces of very good booze."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/119czcK&via=Digg&text=Kurt Vonnegut’s Delightful Term Paper Assignment From 1965

div.a: The Lost Tweets Of The Tech Elite

div.div: How did tech's most influential people tweet four, five and six years ago? Let's take a little trip into Twitter's memory hole.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yy3OJF&via=Digg&text=The Lost Tweets Of The Tech Elite

div.a: How To Interpret The Illnesses Of Public Figures

div.div: GOP elder statesmen George H.W. Bush and Bob Dole were hospitalized, but the extent of their illnesses purposefully kept vague. Here's how to read between the lines.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vamed3&via=Digg&text=How To Interpret The Illnesses Of Public Figures

div.a: Bazooka Kills Its Iconic Comic Strips

div.div: Bazooka, faced with slumping sales, are overhauling their iconic logo and packaging.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YyesQB&via=Digg&text=Bazooka Kills Its Iconic Comic Strips

div.a: When Movie Posters Are Art, Not Commerce

div.div: Hollywood remakes classic movies. The Mondo Gallery in Austin, Texas, remakes classic-movie posters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VarPAc&via=Digg&text=When Movie Posters Are Art, Not Commerce

div.a: The Yes Men Kickstart A Revolt

div.div: The Yes Men on the rejuvenating effects of the Occupy movement, how social media changes the game plan, and the vital role of having fun in activism. As they say, "It's certainly better than sitting on our asses waiting for the world to change on its own. Don't you think?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wz03y4&via=Digg&text=The Yes Men Kickstart A Revolt

div.a: A Supercut Of Hollywood Movies About Photographers

div.div: Simply titled “Photographers,” the video was created by English artists who spent hours watching more than 100 movies. The duo extracted short snippets from each one and spent months turning them into the giant whirlwind tour.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TvMvWT&via=Digg&text=A Supercut Of Hollywood Movies About Photographers

div.div: By reorganizing the typewriter's characters into ready-made clusters of commonly used words, Mao-era Chinese typists solved problems that cell phones only came to recently.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UtUFih&via=Digg&text=Chinese Typewriter Anticipated Predictive Text

div.div: THE MIDDLE EAST VOTE MIGHT SURPRISE YOU

div.a: Here's How Countries Voted On Palestinian Statehood Yesterday And Israel Statehood 65 Years Ago

div.div: The United Nations General Assembly overwhelmingly approved a resolution granting non-member observer status to Palestine. The UN now classifies Palestine in the same manner as the Vatican, a delegation diplomatically known as the Holy See that cannot vote.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VhRBbp&via=Digg&text=Here's How Countries Voted On Palestinian Statehood Yesterday And Israel Statehood 65 Years Ago

div.a: Barack Obama Is Turning the Oval Office Into A Man Cave

div.div: Though our sourcing is spotty on this, we suspect this is the only place Michelle would let the president put the furniture from his bachelor apartment.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QSL1a2&via=Digg&text=Barack Obama Is Turning the Oval Office Into A Man Cave

div.div: Specialistern, Danish for “the specialists,” is a company that operates on the theory that, given the right environment, an autistic adult could not just hold down a job but also be the best person for it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TtECgR&via=Digg&text=The Autism Advantage
